website_summaries.verdict: With only minor concerns and numerous customers who say it's the best antifungal cream they've ever used, it is the best cream available for numerous skin conditions.
pros: Stands out for its waterproof formula that contains 2% Miconazole to treat fungus and zinc oxide to soothe skin
Works on a variety of fungal conditions and soothes skin
cons: Has a thick consistency that isn't as easy to spread as others

customer_reviews.title: Tried everything else; this is different
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering all week with a FEMALE - type yeast infection if you get my meaning. I took my prescribed Diflucan with general relief, but the outside skin/delicate areas remained severely irritated, intensely itchy, even waking me up in the middle of the night, etc. I've been using other OTC creams all week all in combo....Desitin, Lotrimin, and even Cortizone cream it got so bad. Then this Triple Paste AF cream came in the mail 1 hour ago. I am finally completely comfortable and essentially symptom free. I look forward to the skin inflammation/yeast infection healing quickly now. I ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Dead Lift

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: This product did the job for my athlete's foot. The fungus is gone, and it has not returned. So why only three stars? Because of poor packaging. The ointment is in a short fat squeeze tube. Due to the shape, it's hard to squeeze all of the product out of the tube. I had to cut the end off so I could dip my finger in to get more out of the tube. I kept using it for several days after cutting it open. It has not dried out. It would be better if this came in a wide plastic jar. That would make it easier to get all of the product out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect necessity for anyone with folds
customer_reviews.text: I am overweight. There I said it. If you have ever used Butt Paste on a baby's bottom for diaper rash you will unbderstand this product. The A and D is what kills skin bacteria that can get moist and itchy. Use nurses gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I call this the holy grill. Lol. My 16m daughter was suffering from diaper rash for almost a month now that just won't go away. We tried everything, 2 refills of nyastatin, triamcinolone, desitin, butt paste, Burt bees 40% zinc oxide, triple paste cream, any zinc oxide products on it. Tried changing diaper brand and wipes to organic. Soap & water during changed. Nothing works until we started using Triple Paste AF.. used it for over 2 days.(a little bit of it goes a long way).... & .that stubborn rash is gone!!!!!! So thankful I found this. The price does not matter as long it gets the job done, it was worthed... Now, we are stressed free!!
customer_reviews.author: MOMof2

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this based on doing some research online. This product did not disappoint. I have been dealing with a skin yeast rash that was quite itchy and sore. Right after application there was immediant comfort which if you've ever had this kind of rash is huge! Today is my 2nd day of treatment and already there is much improvement. 5 stars all the way! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for parents to keep handy
customer_reviews.text: The regular Triple Paste was all we needed with our oldest. But our youngest would sometimes get a rash that would really make him cry and nothing seemed to help. Just one night of Triple Paste AF, and he was able to sleep through the night and was almost completely healed. Great stuff for parents to keep handy!
customer_reviews.author: Kornbeef

customer_reviews.title: and was perfect for keeping the yeast diaper rash at bay
customer_reviews.text: My son had almost constant yeast diaper rash when he was younger. When we would use antifungal creams plus diaper creams, they would never mix together, so you were stuck using either or. This product mixes perfectly with Triple Paste diaper cream, and was perfect for keeping the yeast diaper rash at bay. It is admittedly expensive, but works like a charm every time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RING WORM DESTROYER
customer_reviews.text: It’s very rare I write a customer review but I have been struggling with a pain in the ass ring worm for a while but then I found this AF cream and it’s dope Af lol. Got rid of my ring worm in like a week or so. Not greasy which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product due to heavy ointment
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works well. Has similar ingredients to other anti-fungal products, but this one comes in a heavy ointment with petrolatum and zinc oxide, so it doesn't soak into the skin. The other ones soak into the skin and disappear in 10 minutes, but this one lasts all day, and that's why it works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Brin

customer_reviews.title: 100+ Ringworms GONE
customer_reviews.text: If you have ringworm, this will save many, many, many nights of stress. We saved a ringworm infested kitten, thinking he had mange and our whole house got ringworm. My other half had over 100 ringworms on her face and upper body. It was BAD. We tried all the ointments, even got an oral prescription from the Dr. This saved us!
customer_reviews.author: Tatum in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice a day, as well as washing twice a day with a tree tea soap. Used probably two weeks past the disappearance of the rash and it hasn't come back. Convinced that using it longer made a difference, but this stuff made the real difference. Very effective OTC ointment. I am still using Zeasorb powder twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: wallace

customer_reviews.title: I can go barefoot again
customer_reviews.text: My feet have been too decrepit to go without socks and shoes. They were crusty and even had bizarre bumps all over them that I attributed to being old and having spent years living in Central American jungles. Then I got athletes foot and bought this at a local pharmacy. Not only did it get rid of the athletes foot, but cleared up all the issues with my feet, bumps and mottled appearance of the flesh included. My feet look healthy, like they did 20 years ago. Maybe I should use it all over the whole body...
customer_reviews.author: Doug Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff! A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Both of my babies had crazy sensitive skin. This created the most amazing barrier and prevented diaper rashes and helped protect existing rashes well enough to let them quickly heal, despite being on a bum stuck in a diaper. I know its a little pricey but its impossible to find in store and SO VERY WORTH IT. I have purchased it at least a dozen times over the past 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paige

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a itchy rash on my chest and neck and could not get rid of it. I tried all kinds of creams and nothing was helping. I figured I would give this product a try since it got really good reviews. I noticed a big difference after the first application. It is a very thick product so you only need a little to spread a good size area and I definitely recommend this product to anyone who has a rash or a fungal rash. It really works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: carol t.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very sticky, a little goes a long way. It breathes and lets you sweat through it, so if you put it on and then wear pants it can feel a little weird, but it does the job so I put up with it. I bought a second tube just to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that helped my baby's rash. I tried everything under the sun, even a medicated product but nothing else worked. I found out about this product on a mommy blog and thank the universe for it. I try to keep some handy for anytime she looks a bit irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Stephania

customer_reviews.title: THE PASTE DID ABSOLUTELY NOTHING FOR MY FOOT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paste base on the glowing reviews, sorry yo say it did not work! I should have gone to CVS and buy their brand because it works! I just wanted to try this paste on glowing reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a godsend! Had tried several creams to get rid of an annoying rash on my leg with no luck. This cream totally cured it in days! Actually saw marked improvement after just a few hours. Now my go to for any rashes/irritation. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McFaddin

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a great product. It’s a bit pasty, but it just works. And vs the small tubes in the store that don’t work as well and more expensive, it’s a no-brainer. I get skin fungus very bad on the back of my thighs and other areas. This stuff just works well and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Not just triple... triple AF!
customer_reviews.text: This paste isn’t just triple, it’s triple AF! It works quite quickly to alleviate rashes. But it’s important to use it morning and night for the full the best effect.
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Yeast diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a yeast diaper rash as reccomended by our pediatrician. In less than 2 days, the rash was significantly cleared up and by 4 days, it was gone. We continued to use twice a day for two weeks and no reoccurrence even weeks later. *according to directions, seek medical advice before using on kids under age 2
customer_reviews.author: jWink63

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver on the worst diaper rash ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 month old daughter had a reaction to the formula which caused the worst diaper rash ever. If her stools touched her skin for a second it seemed like it was burning her skin and as a result the rash was open sores. Awful, seemed so painful. Used this product to avoid infection and there was immediate relief. Within 3 days it was 80% healed. We had to be very generous with the application and cake the ointment on. But it worked wonders! Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: After months of trying other products..this actually worked. Cleared my athletes foot that I had been dealing with for over 6 months. I had tried all of the regular lotions and sprays lotramin and walgreens Off brands. So thankful this cleared it up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money? YES
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this on my daughter's knees and elbows. She has had rash like patches that I have been trying to get rid of for sometime. I have used multiple other antifungal ointments and it is a matter of days and it is back. So my pediatrician recommended this product. I have to say I hesitated because of the price and not knowing if this was going to be another product that didn't work. So far so good, very happy with the results. We are retreating one knee and one elbow, But by far the best ointment for antifungal rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: As a person who suffers from incontinence, occasionally I get yeast rashes. Not often. However, this stuff makes the best diaper rash cream when that problem arises. It doesn't wash off easily like other prescription and non prescription medications do. This is perfect for a moist environment.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Works great for jock itch
customer_reviews.text: I had a fairly embarassing and recurring jock itch that I was too shy to visit a doctor for, so I bought this and a few other similar products as a last ditch effort to not make that dreaded visit. This is the ONLY antifungal I was able to find that not only got rid of the itch and redness over night, but prevents it coming back for some time rather than simply covering up the symptoms so long as you continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: This works very for stubborn rashes. Better than the prescription products because it stays in place and protects the skin. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: It's pricey but it works...
customer_reviews.text: I tried other things but none could ease my private area. This thing along didn't work though. My main healimg source is salt water. After salt water i apply this and it seems working finally.
customer_reviews.author: Sun kyu, Choi

customer_reviews.title: Things are looking up and would recommend to everyone with rash
customer_reviews.text: after 7 months of uncomfortable itching and spreading in an area of post-surgical procedure. Surgeon directed me to a Dermatologist and upon his recommendation I began using Triple Paste AF. Oh, Oh what a relief it was to be directed to this medicine. Things are looking up and would recommend to everyone with rash. Turned out I was allergic to Hydrocortisone and had been using it for 6 months,till it became unbearable.Thank You Triple Paste AF...
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works great on foot fungus
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I have been using this for about 2 weeks and my itchy, red skin is almost all gone. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Emmi Kushnir

customer_reviews.title: Looks ugly, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick white paste with a tiny gritty feel. Also the only one of four treatments that we tried that actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: It works, just use in the morning and at night
customer_reviews.text: I put up with a pretty bad rash for 4 months and finally decided to do something about it. Thankfully it went away in a couple weeks of using this. Dont be an idiot like me and just use this.
customer_reviews.author: Zvayn

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! My son had a yeast rash that kept coming back I tried different diapers different wipes no diapers while at home and the nystatin the doc gave us did nothing
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rc

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Medicates and moisturizes, but it's pasty so it will come off onto clothes. Seller's 1st shipment disappeared but they replaced it quickly. Very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Tinea versicolor is GONE. And the cream is nice and thick so it rubs in to the skin well. Not like the clomitrazol that was a it more wet, and didnt feel good under my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST cream to use for diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST cream to use for diaper rash! It is a little expensive but VERY worth it as it takes very little cream each time and the anti-fungal makes ALL the difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great for jock itch aka ring worm
customer_reviews.text: Great for jock itch fungus along folds on inner thighs. Paste holds the medicine where it should be and keeps the moisture at Bay. Opening is perfect size for loading two fingers and applying. Lasts longer than expected for a small tube.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Happy skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and when I play sports some parts get irritated, this product works great. The only thin is that I will love to have a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Ended up needing a prescription-strength anti fungal, but that's ...
customer_reviews.text: Ended up needing a prescription-strength anti fungal, but that's to be expected: sometimes organisms are going to need stronger-strength medicines to treat effectively.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and Healing
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering with two types of rashes. When I showed my allergist this paste he said it was a good buy. This paste is definitely helping along with the medication prescribed by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Rose P

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: VERY small tube for price. Cheaper and just as effective to buy jar of zinc oxide
customer_reviews.author: patz

customer_reviews.title: Heals skin!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and myself suffer from yeast infections in folds of our skin at times and this clears up and takes away any stinging of raw skin almost immediately. A little pricey but well worth it compared to buying other brands multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this paste. It was recommended to me and believe me it works. Keeps the affected area try while healing it.
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Super thick, stays white. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's really thick. I don't like that it's super white, and stays that way. Seems like it would be good for diaper rash. Not prime eligible, but still arrived within 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: marcela

customer_reviews.title: which is known to feed the fungi and make the problem worse. Not sure how this product has so many ...
customer_reviews.text: Proceed with caution. Ingredients include corn starch, which is known to feed the fungi and make the problem worse. Not sure how this product has so many positive reviews despite this fact, so be forewarned. Also way overpriced for how little you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rhee

customer_reviews.title: Better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other brands it’s way cheaper for the amount. It’s thick so it will stay on your skin way longer than other ones. Me and my wife used it 2 weeks for cat ringworm. It worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: michael zanger

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I had a stubborn fungal infection that would not clear up. Within days of starting triple paste along with using tea tree body wash, my skin was clear.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My baby started to get a neck rash that quickly turned fungal due to how hot it is where we live. A few hours after the very first application, I started to notice a huge improvement on his rash. By the 2nd day, his rash was gone. It is a tad expensive, however you only use a tiny amount per application, so it lasts a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had a 2 week rash. Started out as a reaction to a new diaper. Then it wouldn’t go away. I googled pictures of yeast rashes and that’s what it appeared to be. I have been using this product for almost 3 days and the rash is 85% gone! Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Todd & Marisa

customer_reviews.title: I never leave reviews but I had to say how wonderful this is!
customer_reviews.text: I got a fungal infection on both my forearms and got Tinactin at the local drugstore, which was better than nothing, but I could still feel individual pores being irritated throughout the day. This SOOTHES so nicely!!! And more of the rash is gone every day. I can't tell you the relief it brought, it's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This helped with my babies really horrible rash it was almost bleeding doctor gave us a sample and I just ordered it. Only when it gets red to the point of almost breaking skin . It really helped baby
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Starts acting since first use
customer_reviews.text: The ointment is really good, it starts acting on the affected area since day 1. It provides good relief, especially for people like me that have to walk a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important to have on hand!
customer_reviews.text: When in doubt - go for the tough stuff! It can be hard to know if you baby is experiencing a "yeast" rash or just a typical one. To be on the safe side I recommend keeping some of this on hand when you have a particularly pesky rash! Not sure baby ever had a yeast rash, but this definitely still helped. The consistency is great and there is virtually no smell.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing. My baby has had a diaper rash that gets better then worse for two months. 3 costly dr trips and hundreds on creams and nothing worked. I finally tried this and after one night the rash was 70% better. It’s now 48 hours later and the rash is 95% gone. I’m always going to have this on hand. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Durkan

customer_reviews.title: Close, but no cigar!
customer_reviews.text: Hoped it would clear up my rash... helped but didnt clear it.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the reviews said it's supposed to help relieve diaper rash in a day. It didn't.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great price is pretty steep but unfortunately you can't find ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great price is pretty steep but unfortunately you can't find it in stores anywhere around me did what it was supposed to do

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to keep on hand for skin issues. Although it is costly, I’ve purchased two of these creams because they’ve helped alleviate skin rashes.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: This is not any better than the regular strength of Clotrimazole. So save your money!

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: used for mom on skin breakdown areas. Worked well and use when she gets chafed

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good.
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended to buy this by my son’s pediatrician. It did the job, but it is pricey.

customer_reviews.title: Diaper Rash Cure
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! A friend who's a dermatologist recommended it when our baby got a bad diaper rash. It helped to clear it up quickly and we now use a thin layer before bed whenever her bum starts to get a little red.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A.

customer_reviews.title: Quick remedy, after multiple attempts at other cremes
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy! My son suffers from a rash under the folds of his skins and we use the Triple Paste to help keep it away. After months of doctor visits oatmeal baths and other product we find this to work best.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrible rash due to a powder I used to keep the crease in my legs dry. Nothing worked and I was miserable. I bought this stuff after reading the reviews and I am SO glad I did. My new go to for everything

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Triple Paste is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Triple Paste products. Regular one is BEST diaper cream ever. The AF was harder to find, but worked great when it was needed.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

customer_reviews.text: I have been using regular Triple Paste for years so when I saw this, I ordered it. I go to a pool several times a week and fungal infections are easy to get.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bolton

customer_reviews.title: The diaper rash solution
customer_reviews.text: Although this stuff is super expensive, I haven't found a better cure for diaper rash. Especially if combined with Gold Bond. I've seen red raw rash cure overnight with this combo whereas normal creams would take a few days of treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Baran

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I get a little yeast (YUCK!!) in the corner of my mouth from daily steroid inhalers for asthma. This clears it up so fast and because it is thicker it acts as a great barrier so the area stays dry. I know... gross gross gross. These are real problems people. This works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Makes
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff for a kid’s butt! This stuff works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Tami S.

customer_reviews.title: So Effective
customer_reviews.text: I've probably bought eight tubes of this for our family and always give it as a gift with a description of what a yeast rash looks like to my new mom friends. Those little red bumps are the beast called yeast and triple plaste af is the solution...the OG AF solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and get the generic stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work any better than the $5 generic stuff at the grocery store. Maybe it doesn't even work as good as the generic stuff. It's also as thick as diaper paste, so it makes a mess of your feet to the point that you have to put socks on right away or get it everywhere. Which means you get to deal with swampy, greasy feet for an hour after putting it on. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!! Most of the roughness was gone with use of first tube. I did not use daily so it took several weeks. Using second tube to maintain softness.

customer_reviews.text: I used this product on a heat rash. The product worked great. Nice scent and texture. A little pricey, but worth the splurge.

customer_reviews.text: For athlete's foot, it is not impressive, no better than the cheaper choice.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews but this worked perfectly on the red bumped up rashes on my face. I couldn't get anything to work. Within days they were almost gone. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Mazzoli

customer_reviews.title: Always keep one in my diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I keep one of these on hand for that unexpected 2am yeasty diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Evans

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Only paste to cure daughter's yeast diaper rash after 1 month and 2 rounds of antibiotics with OTC antifungal creams, regular triple paste, and aquaphor. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing diaper rash cream!!!
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing diaper rash cream ever!!! My husband and I had spent close to $1000 on everything from prescription cream to cream from a compounding pharmacy. Nothing worked until we tried Triple Paste AF. We saw results within 2 days and complete healing in 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: csoil1

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is killer. So much of the stuff you buy at the drug store is thin and watery. Not this. This stuff means business and I love it for that.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Works Surprisingly Well
customer_reviews.text: Works effectively and quickly when used. After two days of use, I noticed a significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Cleared up my sons yeast diaper rash after one use! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MamaRN23

customer_reviews.title: I use at the first sign of a fungus infection
customer_reviews.text: Works. And a little goes a long way. Great for itching!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Works almost immediately to start clearing up diaper rash. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Books

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that worked
customer_reviews.text: This product worked better than an prescription our doctor gave us. Worked on yeast and diaper rash
customer_reviews.author: dhackstock0328

customer_reviews.title: Dermatologist recommended,
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended it for an underarm rash. I used it for 14 days and my rash was healed completely.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Graham

product_meta.title: Triple Paste Antifungal Ointment, 2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Triple Paste AF has a unique, stay-put, moisture-resistant formula that promotes healing from the moment it's applied. It provides soothing relief and effective treatment without a prescription.
feature_bullets: Relieves burning, itching, scaling, cracking and overall discomfort
